title: Error updating eth1 chain cache unknown metrics label "routeId"
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

Regression introduced probably by https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/4127

```
Jun-12 16:21:12.527[ETH1]            error: Error updating eth1 chain cache  Added label "routeId" is not included in initial labelset: []
Error: Added label "routeId" is not included in initial labelset: []
    at validateLabel (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/node_modules/prom-client/lib/validation.js:20:10)
    at /usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/node_modules/prom-client/lib/histogram.js:154:3
    at HistogramExtra.observe (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/node_modules/prom-client/lib/histogram.js:50:54)
    at /usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/node_modules/prom-client/lib/histogram.js:126:9
    at JsonRpcHttpClient.fetchJsonOneUrl (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/provider/jsonRpcHttpClient.ts:213:7)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at JsonRpcHttpClient.fetchJson (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/provider/jsonRpcHttpClient.ts:128:16)
    at JsonRpcHttpClient.fetch (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/provider/jsonRpcHttpClient.ts:101:34)
    at Eth1Provider.getBlockNumber (file:///usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/provider/eth1Provider.ts:166:28)
```

**Expected behavior**

<!--A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.-->

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error
-->
